_SettingsPage.AppLang_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for language changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppThemes_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for theme changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppBG_Note: Note: Image must be in .png, .jpg, .tiff or .bmp format and the resolution must be less than 4096x4096
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help1: This thread will handle how many chunks will be split while downloading files. This mechanism behaves in the same way as what IDM and aria2c do.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help5: This thread will handle the extraction/verification process while installing/repairing the game.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help6: Note: This setting is no longer effective while installing Honkai Impact 3rd.
_SettingsPage.Update_LatestVer: You are using the latest version.
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer1: This app is not affiliated with
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer3: and completely open-sourced. Any contribution is welcomed.

_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedTitle: Warning: Delta Patch Update is Detected!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedSubtitle:
Delta patch will be used to update your game from {0} to {1}.
Remember, you might still need to download some files in-game as usual.

Do you want to proceed?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Delta Patch failed to apply. Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Game Conversion failed. Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.PreloadVerifiedSubtitle: Your Pre-load Package is Ready and was Verified!
_Dialogs.LocateInstallSubtitle: Before Installing the Game, Do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.ChooseAudioLangSubtitle: Before installing the game, you need to choose which audio language you want to use (Default: Japanese):
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadNeededSubtitle:
You must download at least {0} of additional/persistent files. You can also skip this process and download it in-game instead.
Would you like to download it now?
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadCompletedSubtitle:
Additonal/Persistent Download has been completed! 
Happy gaming!
_Dialogs.ExtremeGraphicsSettingsWarnSubtitle:
You are about to set the setting preset to Very High!
Very High setting preset is basically 2x Render Scale with MSAA Enabled and it's VERY UNOPTIMIZED! (unless you have a NASA Supercomputer to run it).

Are you sure you want to use this setting?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at this location:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher.
However, you can still use Official Launcher to start the game.

Do you want to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallBHI3LSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at this location:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher.
However, you can still use BetterHi3Launcher to start the game.

Do you want to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamTitle: Existing Installation on Steam is Detected!
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamSubtitle:
Game has already been installed on Steam at this location:

{0}

Do you want to convert this version to the Non-Steam Global version?
Note: Once you initiate the conversion, you can no longer log-in with your Steam account. Only miHoYo/HoYoverse account login method will be available.

Do you want to proceed?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertNeedMigrateSubtitle:
You need to migrate the game installation folder to another location since Collapse doesn't have permission to write to that directory.
It is recommended to move the location to the CollapseLauncher game folder but you can also choose your own location.

Do you want to move it to the CollapseLauncher game folder?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertIntegrityDoneSubtitle:
Game Data Integrity check complete! The conversion process will download at least {0} of files.
You can continue or cancel and come back later.

Do you want to start the conversion process?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertFailedSubtitle:
Conversion process has failed! :(
Please try to start the conversion process again.
_Dialogs.InstallDataDownloadResumeSubtitle:
You have downloaded {0}/{1} of the game previously.

Do you want to resume the download?
_Dialogs.InsufficientDiskSubtitle:
You don't have enough free space to install this game on your {2} drive!

Free Space: {0}
Required Space: {1}.

Please make sure you have enough disk space before installing.
_Dialogs.MigrationSubtitle: Before migrating, do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackTitle: Media Feature Pack can't be found!
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle1: WARNING: Starting from v5.8 update, Honkai Impact 3 needs "Media Feature Pack" to be installed on your PC to run. This will fix "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error in-game.
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle2: You may need to restart your PC after you've installed the Media Feature Pack. You can ignore this warning, but there is a chance that you will get "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error while running the game.
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteTitle: Media Feature Pack has been installed!
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteSubtitle:
Media Feature Pack has been installed on your PC.
Please restart your PC to apply!
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle1: The Launcher Scope's config is broken. Please choose your previous game path manually.
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle2:
Make sure that the location of the game isn't the same as the path of your launcher's config.ini file, which is found here:

{0}
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle3: If the above is valid, move all of your game files to another location, then click on "Locate directory" to choose the path.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle1:
Please locate the downloaded Cookbook before starting the process.
If you haven't downloaded it yet,
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle3: to download the Cookbook file and then click
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle5: to locate the downloaded Cookbook file and continue.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle7: Here's the name of the Cookbook file you need to download:

_InstallMgmt.RepairFilesRequiredSubtitle:
You have at least {0} files ({1}) that need to be repaired before updating!

Note: This process may takes longer than expected (depends on how fast and stable your connection is). Consider using a VPN (a free VPN like ProtonVPN is good enough) if you have slow download speeds :)

_InstallConvert.PageFooter3: close the launcher while conversion is running
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitle:
Note: This conversion will break the integration with default launcher if you installed this game by migrating it.

Please choose your source and target game to be converted:
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitleNotInstalled: Source game isn't Installed! Please choose another game.
_InstallConvert.ConvertSuccessSubtitle: Game Conversion from {0} to {1} has been successfully completed!
_InstallConvert.CookbookDownloadSubtitle: Downloading recipe for conversion from {0} to {1}

You are about to cancel the conversion process. Any conversion progress will be aborted.

Are you sure?
_InstallConvert.CancelMsgSubtitle2:
You are about to cancel the conversion process but your game has been already converted to {0}. You'll be skipping the "Post-Conversion Integrity Verification" phase.

Are you sure?

_AppNotification.NotifMetadataUpdateSubtitle: New metadata for the launcher is available! We recommend you to proceed with installing the update in order to ensure that the launcher can communicate with the miHoYo/HoYoverse servers. Click on "Update Metadata" to update.
